page.title: 01CLACTON general information
page.content: Clacton is an historic town with two very old churches, both mentioned in the old{DOMESDAY BOOK}. As well as the churches there are many other historic houses. The Clacton area is very flat and as it is beside the sea large walls have had to be built to prevent tidal flooding. About half of our area is farmland which is almost all arable farmland. Clacton pier has made Clacton a holiday resort and there are 14 holiday camps mainly for caravans. Clacton is a growing town. There are estates being built everywhere, with more and more commuters coming to live here.
